verses.verse: Let <S%G5293><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> be in subjection to <S%G5293><s%> the higher <S%G5242><s%> powers <S%G1849><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> power1849, 1487 but <S%G3361><s%> of <S%G575><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>; and the powers <S%G1849><s%> that be <S%G5607><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> ordained <S%G5021><s%> of <S%G5259><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>.

Therefore <S%G5620><s%> he that resisteth <S%G498><s%> the power <S%G1849><s%>, withstandeth <S%G436><s%> the ordinance <S%G1296><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>: and <S%G1161><s%> they that withstand <S%G436><s%> shall receive <S%G2983><s%> to themselves <S%G1438><s%> judgment <S%G2917><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> rulers <S%G758><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a terror <S%G5401><s%> to <S%G2041><s%> the good <S%G18><s%> work <S%G2041><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> to <S%G2041><s%> the evil <S%G2556><s%>. And wouldest thou <S%G2309><s%> have no <S%G3361><s%> fear of <S%G5399><s%> the power <S%G1849><s%>? do <S%G4160><s%> that which is good <S%G18><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> thou shalt have <S%G2192><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> the same <S%G846><s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> a minister <S%G1249><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> to thee <S%G4671><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> good <S%G18><s%>. But <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> thou do <S%G4160><s%> that which is evil <S%G2556><s%>, be afraid <S%G5399><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> he beareth <S%G5409><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> the sword <S%G3162><s%> in vain <S%G1500><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> he is <S%G2076><s%> a minister <S%G1249><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>, an avenger <S%G1558><s%> for wrath <S%G3709><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> him that doeth <S%G4238><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%>.

Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> ye must needs <S%G318><s%> be in subjection <S%G5293><s%>, not <S%G3756><s%> only <S%G3440><s%> because <S%G1223><s%> of the wrath <S%G3709><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1223><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%>' sake.

<S%G1063><s%> For <S%G1223><s%> this cause <S%G5124><s%> ye <S%G5055><s%> pay tribute <S%G5411><s%> also <S%G2532><s%>; for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> ministers <S%G3011><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>'s service <S%G4342><s%>, attending continually upon <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> very thing <S%G846><s%>.

Render591, 3767 to all <S%G3956><s%> their dues <S%G3782><s%>: tribute <S%G5411><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> tribute <S%G5411><s%> is due <S%G5056><s%>; custom to whom <S%G3588><s%> custom <S%G5056><s%>; fear <S%G5401><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> fear <S%G5401><s%>; honor <S%G5092><s%> to whom <S%G3588><s%> honor <S%G5092><s%>.

Owe <S%G3784><s%> no man <S%G3367><s%> anything <S%G1487><s%>, save <S%G3361><s%> to love <S%G25><s%> one another <S%G240><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> he that loveth <S%G25><s%> his neighbor <S%G2087><s%> hath fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> this <S%G3588><s%>, Thou shalt <S%G3431><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> commit adultery <S%G3431><s%>, Thou shalt <S%G5407><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> kill <S%G5407><s%>, Thou shalt <S%G2813><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> steal <S%G2813><s%>, Thou shalt <S%G5576><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> covet <S%G1937><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> there be any <S%G5100><s%> other <S%G2087><s%> commandment <S%G1785><s%>, it is summed <S%G346><s%> up in <S%G1722><s%> this <S%G5129><s%> word <S%G3056><s%>, namely <S%G1722><s%>, Thou shalt love <S%G25><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> neighbor <S%G4139><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> thyself <S%G1438><s%>.

Love <S%G26><s%> worketh <S%G2038><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> ill <S%G2556><s%> to his neighbor <S%G4139><s%>: love <S%G26><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> is the fulfilment <S%G4138><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%>.

And <S%G2532><s%> this <S%G5124><s%>, knowing <S%G1492><s%> the season <S%G5610><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> already <S%G2235><s%> it is time <S%G2540><s%> for you <S%G2248><s%> to awake <S%G1453><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> sleep <S%G5258><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is <S%G2257><s%> salvation <S%G4991><s%> nearer <S%G1452><s%> to us than <S%G2228><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> we first believed <S%G4100><s%>.

The night <S%G3571><s%> is far spent <S%G1161><s%>, and the day <S%G2250><s%> is at hand <S%G1448><s%>: let us <S%G659><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> cast off <S%G659><s%> the works <S%G2041><s%> of darkness <S%G4655><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> let us put on <S%G1746><s%> the armor <S%G3696><s%> of light <S%G5457><s%>.

Let us walk <S%G4043><s%> becomingly <S%G2156><s%>, as <S%G5613><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%>; not <S%G3361><s%> in revelling <S%G2970><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> drunkenness <S%G3178><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> in chambering <S%G2845><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> wantonness <S%G766><s%>, not <S%G3361><s%> in strife <S%G2054><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> jealousy <S%G2205><s%>.

But <S%G235><s%> put ye on <S%G1746><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> make <S%G4160><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> provision <S%G4307><s%> for the flesh <S%G4561><s%>, to <S%G1519><s%> fulfil the lusts thereof <S%G1939><s%>.
